Sentencas: Density of electrochemically active triple phase boundary sites is one of the most important factors that affect the performance of composite cathodes in Solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Computer simulations of topological connectivity of the triple phase boundaries in solid oxide fuel cell composite cathodes

Sentencas: Only the topologically connected triple phase boundaries can become electrochemically active.
Titulo: Computer simulations of topological connectivity of the triple phase boundaries in solid oxide fuel cell composite cathodes

Sentencas: Therefore, microstructure-based geometric modeling of topologically connected triple phase boundaries is of interest.
Titulo: Computer simulations of topological connectivity of the triple phase boundaries in solid oxide fuel cell composite cathodes

Sentencas: In this contribution, three-dimensional microstructure simulations are utilized to predict the topological connectivity of the triple phase boundaries in a composite SOFC cathode as a function of the volume fractions of the constituents, particle size, shape, and the thickness of the cathode.
Titulo: Computer simulations of topological connectivity of the triple phase boundaries in solid oxide fuel cell composite cathodes

Sentencas: The simulations show that the volume fractions of the constituent phases and electrode thickness are the most important factors that affect the topological connectivity.
Titulo: Computer simulations of topological connectivity of the triple phase boundaries in solid oxide fuel cell composite cathodes

Sentencas: The simulations also reveal the geometric conditions under which most of the triple phase boundaries are topologically connected, so that for such SOFC cathode microstructures, the existing models for total geometric triple phase boundary length density can be also used to approximate the length density of the topologically connected triple phase boundaries.
Titulo: Computer simulations of topological connectivity of the triple phase boundaries in solid oxide fuel cell composite cathodes
Computer simulations of topological connectivity of the triple phase boundaries in solid oxide fuel cell composite cathodes
